full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS MDZAD PA DGRA JAG DANG PHYUGS NAD BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS ^ SKYABS MGON PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LA ZHUS PAS, DENG SANG MDO SMAD DU DGRA JAG DANG PHYUGS NAD SOGS DER TSE SNA TSOGS 'BYUNG 'DUG PAS DE BZLOG THABS GANG LA 'BAD DGOS ZHUS PA'I LAN LA, DGRA JAG DANG PHYUGS NAD MDZAD ME CHU SOGS KYI 'JIGS PA'I NGO YOD PA'I DE BZLOG THABS GANG LA SHO LO KA GNYIS PO 'DI THAMS CAD KYIS RGYUN 'DON LA 'PHANG @002B NA RIM GYIS ZHI 'GRO GSUNGS SO,, ,,)
